articles.description: Mutations of the coronavirus could render current vaccines ineffective within a year, according to a survey of experts.
articles.content:
Bethany Smith administers a COVID-19 vaccination to a member of the public at a mass vaccination hub for the Aneurin Bevan Health Trust on March 14, 2021 in Newbridge, Wales.

articles.author: Kristen Jordan Shamus
articles.title: Doctors urge women to delay mammogram until 4-6 weeks after COVID-19 vaccine - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: A small number of women have lymph node swelling after getting COVID-19 vaccines that can look like cancer in mammograms, but is completely benign.
articles.content:
For the remainder of 2021, anyone who shows their COVID-19 vaccination card at Krispy Kreme will receive a free original glazed donut.
USA TODAY
